references: J. H. Conway and R. K. Guy, The Book of Numbers, Copernicus Press, NY, 1996, p. 54.
links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
mathematica: lst={};Do[a=n^12;b=(n+1)^12;s=(a+b)*(b-a);AppendTo[lst,s],{n,0,4!}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jan 23 2009 *)Last[#]-First[#]&/@Partition[Range[0,10]^24,2,1] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Apr 19 2014 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
